codon	trivial_name	three_letter_symbol	one_letter_symbol
AAA	Lysine	Lys	K
AAC	Asparagine	Asn	N
AAG	Lysine	Lys	K
AAT	Asparagine	Asn	N
ACA	Threonine	Thr	T
ACC	Threonine	Thr	T
ACG	Threonine	Thr	T
ACT	Threonine	Thr	T
AGA	Arginine	Arg	R
AGC	Serine	Ser	S
AGG	Arginine	Arg	R
AGT	Serine	Ser	S
ATA	Isoleucine	Ile	I
ATC	Isoleucine	Ile	I
ATG	Methionine	Met	M
ATT	Isoleucine	Ile	I
CAA	Glutamine	Gln	Q
CAC	Histidine	His	H
CAG	Glutamine	Gln	Q
CAT	Histidine	His	H
CCA	Proline	Pro	P
CCC	Proline	Pro	P
CCG	Proline	Pro	P
CCT	Proline	Pro	P
CGA	Arginine	Arg	R
CGC	Arginine	Arg	R
CGG	Arginine	Arg	R
CGT	Arginine	Arg	R
CTA	Leucine	Leu	L
CTC	Leucine	Leu	L
CTG	Leucine	Leu	L
CTT	Leucine	Leu	L
GAA	Glutamic acid	Glu	E
GAC	Aspartic acid	Asp	D
GAG	Glutamic acid	Glu	E
GAT	Aspartic acid	Asp	D
GCA	Alanine	Ala	A
GCC	Alanine	Ala	A
GCG	Alanine	Ala	A
GCT	Alanine	Ala	A
GGA	Glycine	Gly	G
GGC	Glycine	Gly	G
GGG	Glycine	Gly	G
GGT	Glycine	Gly	G
GTA	Valine	Val	V
GTC	Valine	Val	V
GTG	Valine	Val	V
GTT	Valine	Val	V
TAA	*	*	*
TAC	Tyrosine	Tyr	Y
TAG	*	*	*
TAT	Tyrosine	Tyr	Y
TCA	Serine	Ser	S
TCC	Serine	Ser	S
TCG	Serine	Ser	S
TCT	Serine	Ser	S
TGA	*	*	*
TGC	Cysteine	Cys	C
TGG	Tryptophan    	Trp	W
TGT	Cysteine	Cys	C
TTA	Leucine	Leu	L
TTC	Phenylalanine	Phe	F
TTG	Leucine	Leu	L
TTT	Phenylalanine	Phe	F
